short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for cloning tabs in Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension that when being clicked allows the user to open a new window instance with the same tabs than the current one.

This can be useful for instance if we are searching multiple flight destinations from one city (ex: Barcelona) and we want to open a new window with the same tabs opened in order to modify only the city from when we flight, but without having to duplicate each tab individually.
